title: Drugs and the nervous system. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: This film explains the serious disruption of the nervous system caused by drugs: aeroplane glue, stimulants (amphetamines), depressants (barbiturates, opiates), marijuana and LSD. This film is animated and is suitable for young children (Early Adolescence).
